data.suite-page-organization-plan-edit-descri: Changes to credit amount will be applied from the next billing period.
data.suite-page-organization-plan-edit-plan-p: Subscribers will get all credits at once.
1 month and shorter subscribers will get all credits at once. Over 3 months subscribers will get credits every month.
data.suite-page-organization-plan-edit-price-: Members will be able to use cards for any sum between US$0.50 and US$5,000, or your local currency equivalent.
